meanings.definition: To slow down or reduce speed.
meanings.sent1: The car was decelerating as it approached the red light.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the train decelerating as it neared the station.
meanings.sent3: The decelerating turtle was in no rush to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The decelerating economy raised concerns among investors.
meanings.sent5: The decelerating spaceship gradually came to a stop in outer space.
